desc: Grandma Hoerners, located in Alma, KS, crafts small batches of delicious preserves, Big Slice Apples, pie fillings, and more using the best ingredients.

layout.text:
Grandma Hoerner's Pecan Everything Filling
Grandma Hoerner’s Pecan Pie Filling is homemade gourmet taste without the work or the mess! 
Shop Now
The perfect flavor of Big Slice as we head into fall & winter!

Grandma Hoerner's Mugs
For warm cocoa or fresh coffee, it's the perfect gift for friends & family.
